description: Attribute precedence reversed — DisplayNameAttribute is checked before DisplayAttribute, causing [Display(Name=...)] to be ignored when both attributes are present. The [Display] attribute should take priority per ASP.NET Core conventions since it supports localization via ResourceType.

Null check for the For parameter removed — when the component is used without binding the For expression, a NullReferenceException is thrown instead of a descriptive InvalidOperationException error message.

ClearCache only clears _memberInfoCache but not _displayNameCache — after a hot reload that changes [Display] attribute values, the stale display name strings persist in the cache, showing outdated labels until application restart.

Expression equality check (For != _previousFieldAccessor) removed — the component recalculates and re-renders on every SetParametersAsync call even when the expression has not changed, violating ASP.NET Core component render optimization conventions.
